mapper.select: select count(*) from board where board_status = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, M.MEMBER_ID, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE", ORIGIN_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.update: update board set count = count + 1 where board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, M.MEMBER_ID, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE", ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO=#{boardNo}

SELECT REPLY_NO ,M.MEMBER_ID ,REPLY_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO) WHERE REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
